title: Australian nation as a settler colony

content.question: The founding of “the Australian nation,” as alluded to in the passage, was part of which of the following processes?

choices.label: The creation of mercantilist empires to extract natural resources
European states’ establishment of settler colonies
European companies’ establishment of overseas trading posts
Japan’s creation of its own empire in Asia

content.answer: European states’ establishment of settler colonies

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
